containerDefinitions.name: alembic-fix
command: ./.venv/bin/python -c "import psycopg; import os; conn = psycopg.connect(os.environ['APP_DATABASE_URL'].replace('asyncpg', 'psycopg')); cur = conn.cursor(); cur.execute('SELECT * FROM alembic_version'); print('Current version:', cur.fetchall()); cur.execute(\"INSERT INTO alembic_version (version_num) VALUES ('499278ad9251') ON CONFLICT (version_num) DO NOTHING\"); conn.commit(); print('Fixed alembic version'); conn.close()"
